description: Information about the cell line or cell culture biomaterial.
title: Cell line
name: cell_line

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

provenance.description: Provenance information provided by the system.

supplier.description: The supplier of the cell line.

catalog_number.description: The supplier catalogue number for the cell line.

lot_number.description: The supplier lot or batch number for the cell line.

catalog_url.description: The supplier catalogue URL for the cell line.

cell_cycle.description: The cell cycle phase if the cell line is synchronized growing cells or the phase is known.

type.example: Should be one of: primary, immortalized, stem cell, stem cell-derived, induced pluripotent, or synthetic.

model_organ.description: Organ for which this cell line is a model.

cell_morphology.description: Features relating to the morphology of the cells.

growth_conditions.description: Features relating to the growth and/or maintenance of the cell lines.

confluency.description: The percent a plate surface is covered by cells.

cell_type.description: The cell type that the cell line represents.

karyotype.description: The karyotype of the cell line.
karyotype.example: sex chromosome complement of XY; del(2) (q11)

tissue.description: The tissue that the cell line was derived from.

date_established.description: Date when the cell line was established.
date_established.guidelines: Enter the date established in date format: yyyy-mm-dd. Supplying partial date is allowed.

disease.description: Short description of any disease association to the cell type.

genus_species.description: The scientific binomial name for the species of the cell line.

publication.description: A publication that cites the cell line creation.

timecourse.description: Information relating to a timecourse associated with this cell line.
